[vc_row type=”full_width_background” full_screen_row_position=”middle” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” top_padding=”40″ bottom_padding=”40″ id=”about-sec” overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”]
[/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUp”]
Welcome to Mamba Point Hotel

Experience Luxury
Away From Home

Mamba Point Hotel was established by an Irish and Lebanese couple, Anna and Chawki Bsaibes on 21 December 1993 and it is the longest established hotel in Liberia. It has recently undergone major renovations and is on a par with top European hotels. It is 4+star family-run boutique hotel set in its own grounds overlooking the Atlantic Ocean and located in the Diplomatic Area with only a minute drive from downtown.[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=”medium” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”none” url=”/contact-us/” text=”Contact Us”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
